name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 28, Li Yang, the founder of "Crazy English", said at the Global Chinese Studies Festival: English is the egg laid by Chinese, and the United States will sooner or later become an inseparable part of China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A netizen on Xiaohongshu posted that he left the country in Pudong, Shanghai on September 28, but was restricted from leaving the country just because his "place of residence is Fuzhou, Fujian".
This netizen has good conditions, works in an Internet company in Shanghai, has not stopped paying social security for five years and holds a residence permit. This year, he has been to Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong, Thailand, Russia and other countries, and holds a multi-year multiple visa for Japan and South Korea.
Because this netizen was stopped by the border inspection, he faced the risk of losing his air tickets and hotels, and was also asked by the police in his place of residence to "go back on a working day to deal with it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 30, the media reported that a food store owner in Tianjin added rat poison to food because he was dissatisfied with being ridiculed by fellow villagers for being unmarried at an old age, resulting in food poisoning for one person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 30, A-shares ushered in an "epic" surge.
As of the close, the Shanghai Composite Index rose 8.06%, the Shenzhen Component Index rose 10.67%, and the ChiNext Index rose 15.36%. The turnover of the three markets of Shanghai, Shenzhen and Beijing was 2611.5 billion yuan.
This is also the first time in nine years that the turnover of A-shares has exceeded 2 trillion yuan again. It took only 35 minutes for the turnover of the Shanghai and Shenzhen markets to exceed 1 trillion yuan, setting a new record for the fastest trillion yuan in history.
Recently, the A-share market has risen from below 2,700 points to above 3,300 points in just a few trading days. From the recent low point to now (i.e. September 18 to September 30), the Shanghai Composite Index has risen by 23.39%, the Shenzhen Component Index has risen by 31.89%, and the ChiNext Index has risen by 41.68%.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 29 (report) In Loudi, Hunan, an eight-year-old boy forcibly carried a five-year-old boy over the railing and pushed him into a pool. Fortunately, his head did not hit the ground and the water in the pool was not deep. The video poster said that the boy's parents had a bad attitude afterwards, claiming that there were two lawyers in the family who could easily file a lawsuit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 29, Chengdu, Sichuan. A strong wind blew in Chengdu that day, and a street lamp pole with a national flag hanging near Jinfu Road broke and fell, hitting an electric bike passing by. When medical staff and traffic police arrived at the scene, they immediately covered the injured with cloth.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, government accounts across the country have been forwarding a cartoon titled "Be careful in what you say and do, and stick to the red line of party discipline." The cartoon requires party members and cadres not to make irresponsible comments or inquire about national policies, and not to spread political rumors that undermine the party's unity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some bloggers created emoticons to summarize the changes in the government’s attitude towards private enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
September 30, Heze, Shandong. Villagers were looking for harvesters to harvest corn, and dozens of elderly people were scrambling to break corn beside the harvesters, regardless of safety. The video shooter: More than a dozen people couldn't drive them away.
The original video has been deleted by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, China launched an intercontinental missile into the Pacific Ocean. Many netizens posted videos saying that the motherland is too powerful and the Dongfeng 31 intercontinental missile is far ahead. However, the pictures and videos used by netizens were videos of Musk's Falcon 9 rocket.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 27, Hong Kong media reported that the Communications Office announced the latest arrangements for real-name registration of phone cards. Users register their phone cards with real names through the "Smart Convenience" platform. As of the end of August, about 3 million phone cards were rejected for registration because customers did not provide information, and about 2.64 million phone cards that did not meet the registration requirements were cancelled. Netizens responded, "Taiwanese compatriots, you must be envious. In the future, Causeway Bay will also have grid workers."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 30, the media reported that a woman in Xi'an was detained by the police for posting a fake video of "snowing in Xi'an" on the Internet. Netizens responded, "If the police have nothing to do, they can just disband it. Is there any harm in this? If the weather forecast is inaccurate, should the meteorological bureau also be arrested?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/GER2Whqvig

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 30 report: Russian Foreign Minister Lavrov expressed confusion over why France and Switzerland participated in the China-Brazil peace initiative meeting while Russia itself was not invited to attend the meeting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to Hong Kong media reports, a 4-year-old boy suffering from asthma in To Kwa Wan, Hong Kong, suddenly fainted after his mother fed him two herbal pills brought back from the mainland through a syringe at home yesterday. He was sent to the hospital and died after more than 7 hours of rescue. His 37-year-old mother was arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 28, Hunan. A disabled delivery boy works on a skateboard. This scene resonated with many netizens, who replied, "What is the purpose of life?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/swwxmSywlP

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 30 (Released) Qinzhou, Guangxi. A boy was knocked down and bitten by a roadside dog for nearly a minute, his face and hands were covered in blood, and no one in the passing car got out to help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This video also awakened many netizens' memories of the epidemic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 29 (Released) A man entered an Apple store, dancing and jumping up and down while holding a Huawei 3-fold phone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Guizhou, a man posted a video saying that during the epidemic, he was the secretary of the Political and Legal Committee of a town. One day, a car from Wuhan passed through the area he was responsible for. At first, he took the people in the car to the hotel, but he received a notice halfway to ask the family to leave. The man could only lie and make excuses to let them leave. The man said that although he completed the task, his faith also collapsed. "Every time I lie, there is a corresponding price. But this time, I will spend the rest of my life to let it go..."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 29, Yonhap News Agency reported that a South Korean research report stated that platforms such as YouTu and NAVER found that Chinese netizens were suspected of organizing and posting negative comments in industries where South Korea and China are in competition, such as electric vehicles and smartphones. The content mainly belittled and criticized South Korea.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 30, the Shanghai Composite Index closed at 3336.50 points, setting a new record for the largest increase since October 2008. On that day, "Hu Xijin" became a hot search on Weibo, sparking discussion. Netizens said: I want to laugh when I think of how Hu Xijin must be scratching his head in anxiety when he finally gets his counterattack but cannot post.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 29, Japanese right-wing groups held an anti-communist march on the streets of Tokyo. The marchers' banners read "Sever diplomatic ties between China and Japan, overthrow the Chinese Communist Party" and other words.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese students in Russia talk about the discrimination they encounter in Russia
